proposal1.heroHeadline: WPI is losing $120,000 annually on manual proposals. Here's the breakdown.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, crafting a proposal is a manual slog. Our AI does it in 47 seconds, fully tailored to your services.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Here are the ongoing losses WPI faces with its current proposal process.

problems.title: Time-Consuming Process
problems.description: Each proposal takes 5 hours to craft. That's 900 hours a year not spent on winning new clients.

problems.title: Missed Revenue
problems.description: Manual proposals lead to slower turnaround. Competitors are closing deals while WPI drafts.

problems.title: Inconsistent Branding
problems.description: Inconsistent branding costs WPI around $30,000 in lost client trust annually.

problems.title: Resource Drain
problems.description: 18-person team spends 20% of its time on proposals. That's talent not focused on creative strategy.

problems.title: High Error Rate
problems.description: Errors in proposals mean $10,000 lost yearly in missed opportunities due to inaccuracies.

problems.title: Limited Scalability
problems.description: With a small team, scaling proposal output is nearly impossible without more hires.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI automation system replaces these inefficiencies with speed and precision.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Manually writing proposals stagnates growth. Our AI crafts them in seconds, ready and branded.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Brand inconsistencies erode trust. Our system ensures every proposal aligns with WPI's identity.

solutions.title: Error Reduction
solutions.description: Manual writing invites errors. Our AI checks and validates data for flawless proposals.

solutions.title: Scalable Output
solutions.description: Scaling proposals manually is costly. Our system scales with no additional hires needed.

solutions.title: Real-Time Insights
solutions.description: Tracking proposal engagement isn't possible manually. Our AI provides real-time analytics.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for WPI's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for WPI around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for WPI.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Unlock Acme Corp's Potential with Tailored Marketing Expertise.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Let's create a strategic plan to enhance your brand presence and increase revenue. We'll leverage our expertise in marketing to drive growth from day one.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Each missed opportunity is potential revenue slipping away.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rates
problems.description: Every visitor who leaves your site without converting is revenue walking out the door. Current conversion rates are below industry standards, costing you potential sales.

problems.title: Brand Visibility
problems.description: Limited brand visibility in key markets means countless potential customers are unaware of your offerings. This results in missed sales and market share.

problems.title: Customer Engagement
problems.description: Lack of engagement with your current customer base leads to lower retention rates. This translates to lost opportunities for repeat business.

problems.title: Outdated Marketing Strategy
problems.description: An outdated marketing strategy affects your competitive edge, leading to missed opportunities in capturing new market segments.

problems.title: Social Media Presence
problems.description: A weak social media presence means missing out on direct interactions with potential customers. This results in lower brand loyalty and awareness.

problems.title: Ineffective Ad Spend
problems.description: Inefficient allocation of ad budget leads to poor ROI. Without proper targeting, ad spend does not convert into actual revenue.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our tailored solutions address each of these challenges head-on.

solutions.title: Digital Advertising
solutions.description: Boost your conversion rates by optimizing ad spend for maximum ROI. We'll target the right audience and drive higher engagement.

solutions.title: Brand Strategy
solutions.description: Increase your brand visibility with a strategic approach. We'll position you to capture new markets and increase your market share.

solutions.title: Social Media Management
solutions.description: Enhance your social media presence to engage and grow your audience. We'll ensure your brand stays top-of-mind.

solutions.title: Market Research
solutions.description: Stay ahead of trends with our thorough market research. We'll provide insights to refine your marketing strategy and maintain competitiveness.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: WPI is your growth partner with a personal touch.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Track Record
whyUsCards.description: We've helped companies like yours grow and thrive in competitive markets.

whyUsCards.title: Tailored Solutions
whyUsCards.description: Our strategies are customized to meet your unique business needs and goals.

whyUsCards.title: Data-Driven Approach
whyUsCards.description: We make decisions based on data, ensuring your marketing efforts are effective.

whyUsCards.title: Industry Expertise
whyUsCards.description: Our team brings extensive experience across various industries to the table.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet your dedicated team of experts.

team.name: John Harris
team.bio: John leads our strategy and client relationships, ensuring each partnership is successful and growth-focused.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery
process.description: We'll dive into understanding your business, goals, and challenges.

process.title: Strategy Development
process.description: Crafting a customized marketing strategy tailored to your needs.

process.title: Execution
process.description: Implementing the strategy with precision and creativity.

process.title: Review & Adjust
process.description: Analyzing results and refining strategies for continued success.

proposal2.pricingIntro: Choose the investment option that best suits your growth aspirations.

pricing.name: Starter Package
pricing.description: Perfect for businesses looking to kickstart their marketing efforts.

pricing.name: Growth Package
pricing.description: Ideal for companies aiming to expand their market presence effectively.

pricing.name: Enterprise Package
pricing.description: Best for established firms wanting to dominate their industry.

proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's chat about how we can take Acme Corp to new heights. No strings attached.

lead.company_description:
More than 85 years of building brands and building businesses, together.

Worldwide Partners is a global network of the top independent marketing services agencies in the world who share an independent spirit and entrepreneurial drive to build commerce through connectivity, creativity and collaboration.

With over 80 agencies in more than 40 countries, and experience in over 90 industry verticals, Worldwide Partners serves as a hub that harnesses the talent, expertise and diversified capabilities of the agencies within our network to reimagine growth for both brands and agencies.
lead.headline: Enabling Growth Through Global Collaboration
